official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to Carbon Water Conservancy District, a public corporation of the State of Utah.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified property to Carbon Water Conservancy District, a public corporation of the State of Utah.
